price: Reci: “Ja vas opominjem Objavom!”, ali gluhi ne čuju poziv kad se opominju.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul innamā undhirukum bil-waḥyi walā yasmaʿu al-ṣumu al-duʿāa idhā mā yundharūna
